ValidationRule.description: Prohibit manager from changing own data.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( Sales_Competency_Assessment__r.User__r.Id = $User.Id) && ( ISCHANGED( Competency__c ) || ISCHANGED( Proficiency_Expectation_for_Role_Target__c ) || ISCHANGED( Employee_Proficiency_Rating__c ) || ISCHANGED( SubCompetency_Needs_Development__c ) || ISCHANGED( Suggested_Development_Actions__c ) || ISCHANGED( Comments__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You may not change your own rating data.
